entries.journal_entry_description: Help Lieutenant Mack Jasper of the Corellian Security Force with his investigations.
entries.journal_entry_title: Help Lt. Jasper of CorSec with his investigations.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Lt. Jasper wants you to help a local starship merchant find a shipment of starship components that has disappeared. Speak with Ral Mundi at the starport entrance to begin.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Help Find the Merchant's Missing Shipment
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Lt. Jasper wants you to look into the cause of some vandalism at the Coronet starport. Speak with the starport master, Jesseb Convorr, to start your investigation.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Lt. Jasper wants you to assist local farmer Pol Handerin with some problems he's been having on his farm. By getting into Pol's good graces, you should then be able to use him as a reference to get some work at the capitol building with Pol's cousin, Gallura Handerin.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Lt. Jasper wants you to look for any unusual activity involving Ragtags or the like while working for the government. When you find something conclusive, report to Lt. Jasper.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Bring the Rogue CorSec datapad to Lt. Jasper.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Bring the Datapad to Lt. Jasper
